item.description:
Hi Everyone,

If you haven't made any 4th of July plans yet why not join us at Hampton North Beach for some fun in the sun and play in the water in your kayaks or just hang out on the beach. We plan to meet at noon but feel free to arrive earlier at the end of the Sea Wall at Hampton North Beach across from Cinnamon Rainbows Surf Shop 931 Ocean Boulevard Hampton Beach. Bring your kayak as well as beach chair. Don't forget the sunscreen!!

There is access to the Beach to Launch kayaks at the North end of the Bicentennial Park. Afterwards we'll head back to my place at 763 Ocean Boulevard for a late afternoon Pot Luck BBQ and social. Anyone who wants to hang around later we'll walk down to view the Hampton Beach 4th of July Fireworks. PLEASE RSVP ASAP if you plan to join us.

Directions to location Bicentennial Park/Cinnamon Rainbows

http://maps.google.com/maps?q=Cinnamon+Rainbows+Surf+Co+Surf,+931+Ocean+Boulevard,+Hampton,+NH+03842&hl=en&ll=42.941437,-70.793924&spn=0.001374,0.001856&sll=42.917725,-70.803985&sspn=0.087371,0.11879&t=h&z=19

If driving from North just follow Coastal Rt. 1A South from Portsmouth when you get to the only Traffic Light on Rt.1A Hampton your there. If coming from Rt. 95 Hampton onto Rt.101 Take a left on Landing Road at Lights then Right onto Winnacunnet. When you see the seawall turn left onto Ocean Boulevard Rt.1A North and at the end of the seawall you'll come to Traffic Lights and Cinnamon Rainbows Surf Shop/Bicentennial Park.

See you on the Beach!

  Neil
item.name: Beach Day & Kayak Hampton North Beach - Pot Luck BBQ afterwards
